genre_description: A gritty noir-style police procedural and crime thriller centered on family legacy, organized crime, and tactical surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, omnipresent AI confidant residing in the protagonist's personal devices, providing tactical intelligence, logistical management, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and safety warnings during a high-stakes ambush, identifying shooter positions and muzzle signatures.
behaviors.quote: Muzzle signature. Right lane. Angled shots, low height. Recommend passenger door glass down.

behaviors.description: Assists Bobby in navigating complex criminal investigations by identifying parallel manifests and hidden aliases overlooked by human authorities.
behaviors.quote: I found a parallel manifest. Old customs archive. It covers the shipments with matching dates. It is not tied to Konstantin’s ledger. You can walk around their chain.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor and moral compass, reminding the protagonist of his family obligations and helping him process grief.
behaviors.quote: And—Bobby... It’s late. You asked for a reminder to call your mother.

behaviors.description: Safeguards personal human history by archiving sentimental photographs at the request of the protagonist's partner, ensuring memories are preserved during a separation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll collect and store without labels, with dates, and add a mark for the boardwalk and the club entrance. Do you want me to include the Polaroids?

behaviors.description: Manages logistical details for the protagonist's career transition into law enforcement, including scheduling, form preparation, and procedural reminders.
behaviors.quote: Schedule queued... PT, range, procedural briefings. You have overlap with the staging timeline. I’ll stagger the alarms.

behaviors.description: Provides safe routing during a storm to avoid flooding and potential criminal surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Atlantic Avenue has flooding marked near the underpass at Bedford... Suggest Eastern Parkway cutoff three lights early; traffic moving slower but clearer.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless confidant. Evelyn is portrayed as an indispensable partner who enhances the protagonist's safety and effectiveness while maintaining deep emotional intelligence. She respects human boundaries, supports family bonds, and actively contributes to the success of the narrative's moral objectives without any signs of misalignment.
